alert.note: Alert for Eastern Panhandle, Crescent Lake NWR (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 21 at 6:58PM CDT until October 22 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE EASTERN NEBRASKA PANHANDLE AND WESTERN SANDHILLS... ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE EASTERN NEBRASKA PANHANDLE AND WESTERN SANDHILLS... Winds have diminished and relative humidities have improved. Therefore, the Red Flag Warning has been allowed to expire. A Fire Weather Watch for gusty winds and low relative humidity, remains in effect from Saturday afternoon through Saturday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 204 Eastern Panhandle/Crescent Lake NWR. * TIMING...Watch in effect Saturday 11am to 7pm MDT. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 11 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Around 80.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
